pinMenuMessageLabel.message: Bandika kiendelezi kutoka kwa menyu ya fumbo hapo juu.
pinMenuMessageLabel.description: Pin the extension from puzzle menu above.

mainWelcomeHeading.message: Dondoa maandishi kutoka kwa ukurasa wowote / pdf kwenye wavuti
mainWelcomeHeading.description: Extract text from any page/pdf on the internet

littleInfoLabel.message: Picha imechukuliwa kwa OCR (Utambuzi wa Tabia ya Macho).
littleInfoLabel.description: Image taken for OCR (Optical Character Recognition).

pdfDragInfoLabel.message: Buruta 'n' dondosha faili hapa, au bofya kuchagua faili.
pdfDragInfoLabel.description: Drag 'n' drop some files here, or click to select files.

littleInfoPdfLabel.message: Pdf imechukuliwa kwa OCR (Utambuzi wa Tabia ya Macho).
littleInfoPdfLabel.description: Pdf taken for OCR (Optical Character Recognition).

uploadPdfLabel.message: pakia pdf ili kutoa maandishi kutoka
uploadPdfLabel.description: upload pdf to extract text from

appDescription.message: Hariri Picha yoyote kwenye mtandao ukitumia kiendelezi hiki.
appDescription.description: Edit any Image on the internet using this extension.

subHeadOne.message: Hariri Picha kutoka folda yako au mtandao.
subHeadOne.description: Edit Images from your folder or Internet.

subHeadOneDesc.message: Fanya Hariri ya Picha kwenye ukurasa wowote wa wavuti [ukitumia kiendelezi cha kivinjari chako] kwenye mtandao au pakia picha yako kwenye wavuti yetu ili kuhariri picha kama mpiga picha.
subHeadOneDesc.description: Do Image Edit on any webpage [using our browser extenion] on the internet or uplaod your image on our website to edit images like a photographer.

subHeadTwo.message: Mazao, Ongeza Nakala, Athari za hali ya juu.

subHeadTwoDesc.message: Mazao, Flip, Mzunguko, Kuchora, Sura, Ikoni, Nakala, Kichujio cha Mask, Kichujio cha Picha na kichujio nyingi cha hali ya juu.
subHeadTwoDesc.description: Crop, Flip, Rotation, Drawing, Shape, Icon, Text, Mask Filter, Image Filter and many advanced filter.

headF1Desc.message: Rekebisha Mwangaza pamoja na Vivutio na Vivuli ili kuongeza utofautishaji.
headF1Desc.description: Adjust Brightness along with Highlights and Shadows to add contrast.

headF2Desc.message: Ongeza Kueneza ili kuongeza rangi, punguza ili kupunguza kiwango chao.
headF2Desc.description: Increase Saturation to enhance colors, decrease it to reduce their intensity.

headF3Desc.message: Ongeza kunoa ili kuongeza kulinganisha na maelezo na mistari ndani ya picha yako.
headF3Desc.description: Increase Sharpen to add contrast to the details and lines within your photo.

labelEditPhotoLike.message: Jinsi ya kuhariri picha kama mpiga picha
labelEditPhotoLike.description: How to Edit a Photo like a Photographer
